wikipedia_page.main: Samir Nabi (born 16 December 1996) is a professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Hereford. Born in England, he represents Pakistan internationally.

Rahis Nabi is the younger brother of Samir Nabi and Adil Nabi, both of whom are also footballers and were at West Bromwich Albion's academy.
